text:
About 1.37 lakh children and adolescents in the age group of 1 to 19 would be provided albendazole tablets on February 10, National De-worming Day, in the district, Collector K.Nandakumar said.

Speaking at a consultative meeting to discuss the arrangements for the exercise, he said the tablets would be distributed through government, aided and private schools, Anganwadis, taluk medical officers and village nurses.

Children of one to two years age would be given the medicine in liquid form. An exercise to cover omitted persons would be held on February 15.
title: De-worming Day
